import React from 'react'; import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; const VestibularFreePlay = () =>{ return(

Vestibular Free Play

We all know how energetic our young tots are. And in Tactile Tots, we believe that both mind and body matters! So we planned this class as an open play for mixed-aged groups wherein children have a safe outlet to release their energy and they are free to explore and use our high-quality equipment that can develop their gross motor skills and vestibular system. So come join us and get ready to move and groove!

What are Gross Motor Skills? Gross motor skills are movements of our large muscles. It involves the coordination of our muscles and the neurological system. Why are these important for our tots? The Pathways Organization cites these reasons: to be able to move and complete tasks independently, to be able to explore the world around them, which promotes cognitive, speech, and sensory development, to give them confidence and independence, and to possibly help prevent early motor delays and conditions that can interrupt development
) } export default VestibularFreePlay;
